Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, in need of an update but acceptable”
Reviews.Author: ahilton
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights mum found price paid hotel close london reasonable couple minor issues drawers wipe tv remote missing easily resolved hotel bit update regards cleanliness slightly annoying wifi didnt connect checking emails quickly sitting lobby fine breakfast basic cereal toast jam tea juice considering price paid didnt expect staff friendly helpful service 5 minutes walk wembley central tube 30 mins london tube close explore capital overall stay price

Reviews.Title: “Avoid”
Reviews.Author: fran c
Reviews.Content: husband couple weekend nfl game wembley tiny dirty website completely inaccurate remote control tv hairdryer phone plug sink hear avoid hotel costs truly awful

Reviews.Title: “dirty”
Reviews.Author: famousdaisy5
Reviews.Content: unfortunatly stay dissapointing cost stay 2 nights beginning firstly car park squeeze car park massive skip plonked beds lying truely awful check god damp spots wall stunk damp food stains walls wires floor carpets sticky 6 sockets shower people werent using showers walls paper thin doors secure huge gaps door person bathroom ie using shower toliet mean squeeky floor boards thats time choose stay hotel close wembley arena 10 minutes walk plenty shops resturants time travel lodge id spend recommend

Reviews.Title: “No complaints here”
Reviews.Author: clarestudent
Reviews.Content: stayed ibis wembley week spotless modern reading reviews site wasnt expect euro hotel actually pleasantly surprised friendly staff characterful clean nice shower little noisy night outside cant blame hotel transport links town excellent ibis actually town bad ok walking home 9 night am lone female

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Wembley Stadium, comfy bed”
Reviews.Author: Kathleen068
Reviews.Content: nice bed comfy gentlemen checked friendly location wembley stadium close wembley central tube station easily accessible central london breakfast pretty typical continental croissant ive enjoyed

Reviews.Title: “About as Euro as the pound!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Greatbritishbreaker
Reviews.Content: hotel false advertising start dont believe pictures website apart front wrong start booked hotel arrived critical size fiance child shower didnt drain sorted mentioned morning called reception tv remote wasnt delivered service industry remember advertised continental breakfast morning comprised cornflakes soggy toast tinned fresh fruit salad im continent proud juices plentiful surprising considering apple juice son tasted urine talking manager morning regarding shower mentioned bed completely knackered basically sleeping broken divan base straight dont worry change guess coming day visiting sites london overall location perfect wembley visiting london 20minutes tube â£50 night price tag considering stay country mistake wont london shocking breakfast sleeping comfortable bed disgraceful hope people read overpriced youth hostel thank apologies reception adequate compensation truely memorable stay obvious positve reviews hotel posted staff night shift

Reviews.Title: “Another wonderful stay in this friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: SussexJanie
Reviews.Content: travelled london status quo wembley arena chose euro wembley hotel choice hotel convenient wembley central tube station feel welcome staff 32 adequate comfortable bed spotless linen spotless ensuite shower bonus hotel quiet location unusual london appreciated 2 nights partying recommended nearby thirsty irish bar wembley arena bar characters welcome karaoke saturday night forget recommend hotel fantasic value money convenience location

Reviews.Title: “If you cant afford a better hotel then stay at the Euro Wembley !”

Reviews.Content: checkin quick joy cramped ensuite facility space getting bath heating timer controlled till 1930 hrs switched 0630 hrs am chilly weather tariff includes continental breakfast fruit pulp toast hardly adequate day sightseeing cbd receptionist lady busy daytoday issues boss pre occupied running shoestring hotel location reaching wembley euston road london central business district etc family accommodation look elsewhere business travellers accommodation premier inn quality comforts hotel road blocks internet wifi available lobby roughly 3 3 feet space 3 tables 6 chairs thrown dont leave glued tv screen playing football matches 2 satchets milk coffee powder bit little laptop sipping coffee meagre facility recommend friends family

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel august event wembley ideal situation wembley dirty tired staff rude except breakfast staff kettle told wasnt hotel left moved cups tea coffee stuff kettle
